title: -webkit-app-region
Edit distances
definition: {"time":1601413549002,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Compute a numerical distance between two words. Ex. Elephant and Ellefant"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We count the operations:"}},{"type":"list","data":{"style":"ordered","items":["Match","Addition","Subtraction"]}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We are interested in edit distances that are smaller than the length of the word"}}],"version":"2.18.0"}

title: JavaParser
definition: {"time":1604260857230,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"In its simplest form, the JavaParser library allows you to interact with "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Java source code as a Java object representation in a Java environment. More formally we refer to this object representation as an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST). "}}],"version":"2.18.0"}

title: bit vector
definition: {"time":1604256717915,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The combination of bit values to represent more than two states. 4-bit vector: 0000"}}],"version":"2.18.0"}

title: Full table scan
definition: {"time":1603351293688,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Going through all the tuples of a relation and return all the records that satisfy the query. "}},{"type":"code","data":{"code":"Select * \nfrom R\n"}}],"version":"2.18.0"}

title: Bit shift
definition: {"time":1604259081917,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Signed Shift right >>"}},{"type":"code","data":{"code":"1000 0000 >> 5 = 1111 1100\n\n// shifts the bit 5 steps to the right"}}],"version":"2.18.0"}

title: Profiler
definition: {"time":1604262185676,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A profiler finds out where your code spends time. "}},{"type":"list","data":{"style":"ordered","items":["Hprof -> slow","Honest profiler -> best","Creates a flame graph as svg file. "]}}],"version":"2.18.0"}
